description: Allows for reading the state of precipitation from devices that report it.

precipitationIntensity.label: precipitation intensity
precipitationIntensity.description: A human readable representation of the presence of precipitation or the precipitation intensity (values based on definitions for rainfall from U.S. N.O.A.A. or U.K. Met Office).

possiblePrecipitation.description: There is likely precipitation, but the intensity is not known.
possiblePrecipitation.label: possible precipitation

light.description: There is light precipitation (generally for rainfall with a precipitation rate that is < 0.2 in/hr or < 2 mm/hr).
light.label: light

moderate.description: There is moderate precipitation (generally for rainfall with a precipitation rate that is between 0.21 in/hr to 0.5 in/hr or 2 mm/hr to 10 mm/hr).
moderate.label: moderate

heavy.description: There is heavy precipitation (generally for rainfall with a precipitation rate that is > 0.5 in/hr or 10 mm/hr to 50 mm/hr).
heavy.label: heavy

violent.description: There is violent precipitation (generally for rainfall with a precipitation rate that is > 2.0 in/hr or > 50 mm/hr).
violent.label: violent
